channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Estée Lauder’s stock is the S&P 500’s worst performer today, as investors were betting on much higher profits
item.description: Estée Lauder’s stock tumbled Thursday after the company raised its profit outlook, but not by enough to meet high investor expectations.

item.title: Why Alphabet’s stock is falling despite booming cloud growth
item.description: Shares declined Thursday as Google’s staggering $185 billion capital-expenditure forecast overshadowed a blowout fourth quarter.

item.title: Oracle’s stock suffers worst eight-day stretch in over two decades. Here’s why.

item.title: Jefferies says Alphabet’s spending plans are great for Broadcom. The analyst sees a 60% surge
item.description: Jefferies believes that Broadcom has an edge over rival MediaTek in supplying Alphabet’s next two major chip generations.
